outline:
1. a stumbling, means or occasion of stumbling, stumbling block
    1. stumbling, fall
    2. means or occasion of stumbling, stumbling block
kjv_def: caused to fall, offence, [idiom] (no-) thing offered, ruin, stumbling-block.
strongs_def: a stumbling-block, literally or figuratively (obstacle, enticement (specifically an idol), scruple)
